{{cpp/chrono/year/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|1=
template &lt;class CharT, class Traits&gt;
std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp;
to_stream(std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp; os, const CharT* fmt, const std::chrono::year&amp; y);
}}
{{dcl end}}

输出 {{tt|y}} 到流 {{tt|os}} 中，按照空终止格式字符串 {{tt|fmt}} 格式化。

=== 格式字符串 ===
{{cpp/chrono/to_stream format begin}}
{{cpp/chrono/to_stream format rows/year}}
{{cpp/chrono/to stream format unspec}}
{{cpp/chrono/to_stream format rows/month}}
{{cpp/chrono/to_stream format rows/day}}
{{cpp/chrono/to_stream format rows/weekday}}
{{cpp/chrono/to_stream format rows/date}}
{{cpp/chrono/to_stream format rows/time}}
{{cpp/chrono/to_stream format rows/others}}
{{cpp/chrono/to_stream format end}}

=== 返回值 ===
{{tt|os}}
